# moveability: Forget walkability, i wanna skate

Infrastructure to calculate comprehensive moveability statistics for a nominated
city. Moveability is intended to connote any means by which people might
actively move thenselves, primarily implying walking and cycling, but also
potentially skating, scootering, wheelchairing, or any other conceivable form of
active transport.
